articles.author: Emma Smith, Dan Roan
articles.title: Donald Trump: American president named inaugural Fifa Peace Prize winner - BBC
articles.description: US President Donald Trump receives the inaugural Fifa Peace Prize before the draw for the 2026 Fifa World Cup.
articles.content:
Staged just a mile from the White House, this is a World Cup draw with a distinctly political feel.
The glittering ceremony is at the Kennedy Center, the famous Washington arts venue now chaired by … [+1966 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump's security strategy slams European allies and asserts U.S. power in the Americas - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration has set forth a national security strategy that paints European allies as weak and aims to reassert America's dominance in the Western Hemisphere.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump's administration has set forth a new national security strategy that paints European allies as weak and aims to reassert America's dominance in the Western Hemispher… [+7024 chars]
